tool_description: REST API to add, customize and search text and image watermarks within documents of various file formats.
name: GroupDocs Watermark Cloud
title: GroupDocs Watermark Cloud

api_list.name: GetSupportedFileFormats
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://groupdocs-watermark-cloud.p.rapidapi.com/watermark/formats"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "groupdocs-watermark-cloud.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

schema.description: Describes object which contains list of supported file formats.

api_list.name: Add
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://groupdocs-watermark-cloud.p.rapidapi.com/watermark"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "groupdocs-watermark-cloud.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

Extension.description: Gets or sets the filename suffix (including the period ".") e.g. ".doc".

FileFormat.description: Gets or sets the file type name e.g. "Microsoft Word Document".

PageCount.description: Gets or sets the total number of document pages.

Size.description: Gets or sets the size of the document in bytes.
